title: Just Monika v0.7.1
author: ooLinkoo
description:
Just Monika~

All credit for the creation of this model goes to [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/zeloan] ZeloAn [/url]
I simple sprinkled on some animation and code, so Monika can keep you company even from your desktop!

Set mouse tracking to Auto(settings>model) for best results, as there are no idle actions implemented yet.

Implemented:
-5 expressions
-6 reactions from tapping
-Idle breathing/blinking
-Mouse tracking

Planned:
-Idle actions (aside from breathing)
-Intimacy/affection parameter
-specific tap areas and reactions (very soon)

Big thanks to [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198292069078]FrB35[/url] making the animated classroom background, get it here:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1370239430

Feel free to comment and/or drop some suggustions below, thanks for your support!
